TITLE: Here's how much it costs to rent a 1-bedroom apartment across 10 major cities in Asia
SUMMARY: Here is the median price to rent a 1-bedroom apartment across 10 major cities in Asia, according to the Global Property Guide.

TITLE: The Federal Reserve holds interest rates steady, offers no relief from high borrowing costs — what that means for your money
SUMMARY: The Federal Reserve pushed out rate-cut expectations — here's what that means for your credit card, mortgage rate, auto loan and savings account.

TITLE: How to make your home hurricane resistant, as scientists predict an 'extremely active' storm season
SUMMARY: Upgrades could help consumers protect their home, typically one of their most valuable assets, from hurricanes and other natural disasters.

TITLE: Demand for riskier adjustable-rate mortgages hits highest level of the year, due to rising rates
SUMMARY: The share of ARM applications rose to 7.8% of mortgage demand last week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association. That is the highest level of the year.

TITLE: Home prices soar even higher in February, despite higher mortgage rates, says S&P Case-Shiller
SUMMARY: It marked another increase after the prior month's annual gain of 6%, and the fastest rate of price growth since November 2022.

TITLE: As home sellers, buyers wait on a Fed cut, here's how mortgage rates have impacted the spring housing market
SUMMARY: While some buyers have come to terms with 7% interest rates, the rate volatility is the factor with the biggest impact, an economist says.

TITLE: Saudi Arabia says all NEOM megaprojects will go ahead as planned despite reports of scaling back
SUMMARY: "For NEOM, the projects, the intended scale is continuing as planned. There is no change in scale," Saudi Economy Minister Faisal Al Ibrahim told CNBC.

TITLE: New home sales inch higher despite 7% mortgage rates: 'There's more opportunity,' economist says
SUMMARY: Buyers are highly considering newly built homes amid a shortage of available homes in the U.S. Here's what this means and where prices are standing.

TITLE: Mortgage demand drops as interest rates soar over 7%
Luxury real estate prices just hit an all-time record
SUMMARY: Luxury real estate sales increased more than 2%, posting their best year-over-year gains in three years, according to Redfin.

TITLE: Here's why FEMA has spent about $4 billion to help destroy flood-prone homes
SUMMARY: Floodplain buyouts allow homeowners to move out of harm's way and help the community create open space that can collect flood waters to protect other homes.

TITLE: Homeownership isn't for everyone, money coach says: Don't fall for artificial 'pressure to buy'
SUMMARY: Latina financial expert Jannese Torres, host of the "Yo Quiero Dinero" podcast, discusses what she has learned about certain milestones such as homeownership.

TITLE: Mortgage rates are now at the highest level of the year, and could still climb
SUMMARY: The average rate on the popular 30-year fixed mortgage sits around 7.5%, the highest level since mid-November of last year, according to Mortgage News Daily.

TITLE: S&P 500 gives up its earlier gains — but Meta bucks the trend as new AI model debuts
SUMMARY: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.

TITLE: Here are some tips for homebuyers to save on costs with newly built homes, experts say
SUMMARY: While the cost of a new house depends on multiple factors, the sticker price might jump on the finishes you add, an advisor says. Here's how to cut costs.

TITLE: March homes sales dropped despite a surge in supply. Here's why.
SUMMARY: The median price of an existing home sold in March was $393,500, up 4.8% from the year before.

TITLE: Regional bank earnings may expose critical weaknesses, former FDIC Chair Sheila Bair warns
SUMMARY: Sheila Bair, who ran the FDIC during the financial crisis, is nervous about a handful of regional banks going into earnings.

TITLE: Vietnamese property tycoon sentenced to death in country’s largest financial fraud, state media reports
SUMMARY: The Vietnamese property tycoon Truong My Lan was sentenced to death on Thursday for her involvement in the country's biggest financial fraud case.

TITLE: Should you refinance your mortgage? Here are three signs it's time, real estate experts say
SUMMARY: Mortgage refinance activity plummeted to record lows in 2023 after interest rate hikes. Here are three signs to help you decide when refinancing makes sense.

TITLE: Mortgage refinance demand surges even as rates cross back over 7%. Here's why
SUMMARY: The average contract interest rate for 30-year fixed-rate mortgages with conforming loan balances ($766,550 or less) increased to 7.01% from 6.91%.

TITLE: China needs a narrative that house prices are going to rise, Nomura's Koo says
SUMMARY: China needs to convince people that home prices are on their way up in order for growth to pick up, said Richard Koo, chief economist at Nomura.

TITLE: Buyers of newly built homes can face a property tax surprise. Here's why
SUMMARY: Newly built homes often come with a buffet of perks from the building company. However, first-time owners often face a property tax shock after the first year.

TITLE: $1 million homes are now 'typical' in a record number of U.S. cities, analysis finds. Here’s where they are
SUMMARY: There are 550 American cities where the typical home is valued at $1 million or more, a new record high, according to a new analysis by Zillow. Here's why.

TITLE: KKR says China's real estate correction may only be halfway done
SUMMARY: China's real estate troubles are likely far from over and industry problems need to be addressed quickly for GDP growth to rise significantly, according to KKR.

TITLE: Here's what tenants need to know about Biden's plan to cap rent hikes for some affordable housing units
SUMMARY: The Biden administration moved this week to limit how much rent can rise in certain affordable housing units across the country.

TITLE: Weekly mortgage demand remains stalled, as interest rates stay stubbornly high
SUMMARY: Mortgage rates didn't move much last week, and for the second week in a row, neither did mortgage demand.

TITLE: Housing 'affordability has just totally collapsed,' economist says
SUMMARY: February 2021 was the last month when households earned more money than they needed to afford a home. While the deficit shrunk, costs remain high for buyers.

TITLE: Here's what upgrading to a nicer home could cost you, and why it's locking up the market
SUMMARY: The average homeowner with a near record-low mortgage rate would see their monthly payment shoot up 132% in order to move up to a 25% more expensive home.

TITLE: Rents across the U.S. grew for the first time in 6 months — only Arizona saw price drops in every metro
SUMMARY: One of the main drivers of high housing costs is low supply. Cities in this state are boosting supply, helping push rental prices down.

TITLE: Mortgage demand stalls, even as interest rates moderate
SUMMARY: The usually busy spring housing market is underway, but mortgage demand isn't moving.
